966710.name: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War - Original Soundtrack
966710.description:
The full soundtrack for Sigma Theory by award-winning composer Siddhartha Barnhoorn (Out There, Antichamber, The Stanley Parable).
Tracklist:
01 - The Sigma Theory
02 - World Summit 2025
03 - Recruitment
04 - Deployment
05 - Strategic Advantage
06 - Exfiltration
07 - Agent Lost
08 - Covert Operation
09 - Gathering Intelligence
10 - Asset Aquired
11 - Skills In Diplomacy
12 - Discovery
13 - Tactical Decision
14 - Defeated
15 - Technological Singularity
966710.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
